definition: to aspire
to warm up/to heat up/hot (of weather)/heat/fervent
full moon/to hope/to expect/to visit/to gaze (into the distance)/to look towards/towards
15th day of month (lunar calendar)/old variant of 望[wang4]

sentences.english: And you no longer look with love on me.
sentences.chinese: 不要可怜我，虽然你不再看我一眼，热望已退。

sentences.english: Aspires to own his own business following his basketball career.
sentences.chinese: 热望拥有跟随他的篮球事业的他自己的生意。

sentences.english: I am weary of culture and history; I can no longer bring myself to embrace its torments and its aspirations.
sentences.chinese: 我不再能让我自己去拥抱它的折磨与它的热望。

sentences.english: Ready am i to go, and my eagerness with set sails full awaits the wind.
sentences.chinese: 正要出发，我的热望扯满帆篷等待风起。

sentences.english: I can no longer bring myself to embrace its torments and its aspirations.
sentences.chinese: 我不再能让我自己去拥抱它的折磨与它的热望。

sentences.english: We meet when we are waiting for the morning light, which we both hold too many thirsts.
sentences.chinese: 对于黎明，还有曙光，我们都有太多的热望。

sentences.english: In the meantime please be assured of our most cordial good wishes and of our desire to be of service.
sentences.chinese: 同时，请牢记我们最传奇的宿愿和为您服务的热望。

sentences.english: Do you aspire to know the heights, and depths, and lengths, and breadths?
sentences.chinese: 你是否热望要知道上帝的长阔高深？

sentences.english: The yearning tears are the deep rain and curtain.
sentences.chinese: 热望的泪是深深的雨幕。

definition: zeal/enthusiasm/ardor/enthusiastic/warmhearted
to expect/to look forward to/anxious for sth/to hope (to get sth)
to long for/to crave for/to greatly desire
to long for/to look forward to/longing/vision for the future
(literary) to hope for/to wish
to hope/to expect/expectation(s)
to thirst for/to long for
to miss/to long for/to remember with longing/yearning
to yearn for/to look forward to
hope and expectation/to anticipate/to look forward to/to await expectantly
to have one's heart filled with/(to collide) full on/(of farm animals) heavy with young
to think fondly of
to hope/to wish/hope/wish/(old) name of an official post
idealism
to thirst for
utterly sincere/wholly devoted
